name: dol_remote_save

scripts.build:start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run integrate:html && npm run start
scripts.build:android: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run integrate:android
scripts.build:html: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run integrate:html
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:js && npm run clean:integrate
scripts.clean:integrate: npm run clean:integrate:android && npm run clean:integrate:html
scripts.dist: npm run dist:js && npm run dist:html && npm run dist:css1 && npm run dist:css2 && npm run dist:package
scripts.integrate: npm run integrate:html && npm run integrate:android
scripts.integrate:html: npm run integrate:html:zip && copyfiles -u 1 dist/**/* integrate/html/Degrees_of_Lewdity/
scripts.integrate:android: npm run integrate:android:decomp && npm run integrate:android:rename && npm run integrate:android:copy && npm run integrate:android:build
scripts.integrate:android:build: npm run integrate:android:build:1&& npm run integrate:android:build:2 && npm run integrate:android:build:3 && npm run integrate:android:build:4
scripts.start: cd ./integrate/html/Degrees_of_Lewdity && start "Degrees of Lewdity" /d "J:\Program Files\nwjs-sdk-v0.89.0-win-x64\" nw.exe --remote-debugging-port=9222 "%cd%/integrate/html/Degrees_of_Lewdity

author: RyanShy
description: An extension for DoL (Degrees of Lewdity) to allow saves on a remote Server
